Description.Name: Electric Discharge ProtoMech Armor
Description.Details: Electric Discharge ProtoMech Armor was developed by Scientist Glenneth of Clan Fire Mandrill in 3066. By 3071 the Mandrills and The Society had perfected the armor. To maximize the damage generated by a ProtoMech's physical attack, Glenneth wove a series of compound capacitors through the armor. These capacitors draw power from the ProtoMech's fusion engine, storing an electrical charge. When a ProtoMech with EDP armor performs a physical attack the capacitors discharge and subject the target to a taser-like effect.
